languages.text: Осквернив свое судно технологиями ксеносов, капитан Саргона попрал вековые заветы Лекс Империалис. Однако, дерзнув похитить священную десятину, он лишил себя даже ничтожного шанса на праведную смерть.

traits.locale_text: Осквернив свое судно технологиями ксеносов, капитан Саргона попрал вековые заветы Лекс Империалис. Однако, дерзнув похитить священную десятину, он лишил себя даже ничтожного шанса на праведную смерть.

languages.text: By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. But in committing the heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe, he has forfeited even the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.
languages.original_text: Осквернив свое судно технологиями ксеносов, капитан Саргона попрал вековые заветы Лекс Империалис. Однако, дерзнув похитить священную десятину, он лишил себя даже ничтожного шанса на праведную смерть.

traits.locale_text: By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. The heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe has left him without the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. The heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe has left him without the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. His heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe means he has forfeited even the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. But in committing the heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe, he has forfeited even the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. But in committing the heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe, he has forfeited even the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

languages.text: Kaptan Sargona, gemisini zeno teknolojisi ile kirleterek Lex İmperialis'in kadim yasalarını hiçe saydı. Ayrıca kutsal aşarı çalmak gibi haince bir eylemde bulunarak erdemli bir ölümle bağışlanma şansını hepten kaybetti.
languages.original_text: By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. But in committing the heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe, he has forfeited even the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

traits.locale_text: Kaptan Sargona, gemisini zeno teknolojisi ile kirleterek Lex İmperialis'in kadim yasalarını hiçe saydı. Ayrıca kutsal aşarı çalmak gibi haince bir eylemde bulunarak erdemli bir ölümle bağışlanma şansını hepten kaybetti.

languages.text: 己の船を異星技術で穢したことにより、キャプテン・サルゴナはレックス・インペリアのいにしえの禁忌を軽んじた。だが、聖なる租税を盗むというこの凶悪な行為によって、彼は正しき死を迎えるわずかな可能性すらも失ったのだ。
languages.original_text: By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. But in committing the heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe, he has forfeited even the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

traits.locale_text: 己の船を異星技術で穢したことにより、キャプテン・サルゴナはレックス・インペリアのいにしえの禁忌を軽んじた。だが、聖なる租税を盗むというこの凶悪な行為によって、彼は正しき死を迎えるわずかな可能性すらも失ったのだ。

languages.text: Durch die Entweihung seines Schiffes mit Xenotech hat Kapitän Sargona die überlieferten Verbote des Lex Imperia mit Füßen getreten. Mit dem ketzerischen Diebstahl des heiligen Zehnts hat er allerdings jedes Recht auf einen rechtschaffenen Tod verwirkt.
languages.original_text: By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. But in committing the heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe, he has forfeited even the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

traits.locale_text: Durch die Entweihung seines Schiffes mit Xenotech hat Kapitän Sargona die überlieferten Verbote des Lex Imperia mit Füßen getreten. Mit dem ketzerischen Diebstahl des heiligen Zehnts hat er allerdings jedes Recht auf einen rechtschaffenen Tod verwirkt.

languages.text: En profanant son vaisseau à l'aide de xénotechnologies, le capitaine Sargona a défié les interdictions ancestrales de la Lex Imperialis. Mais en commettant un acte impie, en dérobant la dîme sacrée, il a renoncé à la moindre chance de se voir octroyer une mort vertueuse.
languages.original_text: By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. But in committing the heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe, he has forfeited even the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

traits.locale_text: En profanant son vaisseau à l'aide de xénotechnologies, le capitaine Sargona a défié les interdictions ancestrales de la Lex Imperialis. Mais en commettant un acte impie, en dérobant la dîme sacrée, il a renoncé à la moindre chance de se voir octroyer une mort vertueuse.

languages.text: Al mancillar su nave con xenotecnología, el capitán Sargona ha violado las prohibiciones ancestrales de la Lex Imperialis, pero es el atroz hurto del sagrado diezmo, lo que le arrebata toda posibilidad de recibir una muerte digna.
languages.original_text: By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. But in committing the heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe, he has forfeited even the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

traits.locale_text: Al mancillar su nave con xenotecnología, el capitán Sargona ha violado las prohibiciones ancestrales de la Lex Imperialis, pero es el atroz hurto del sagrado diezmo, lo que le arrebata toda posibilidad de recibir una muerte digna.

languages.text: 萨戈纳舰长在自己的船上使用异形科技造物，违背了《帝国法典》中关于禁止使用异形科技的条例。不仅如此，他还妄图夺取神圣什一税。犯下了如此重罪，他已经彻底失去了以正义之名赴死赎罪的机会。
languages.original_text: By defiling his ship with xenotech, Captain Sargona has scorned the ancient prohibitions of the Lex Imperialis. But in committing the heinous act of stealing the sacred tithe, he has forfeited even the slightest chance of dying a righteous death.

traits.locale_text: 萨戈纳舰长在自己的船上使用异形科技造物，违背了《帝国法典》中关于禁止使用异形科技的条例。不仅如此，他还妄图夺取神圣什一税。犯下了如此重罪，他已经彻底失去了以正义之名赴死赎罪的机会。
